Articles.Content:
So finally, I have created the nation Kerbonisia (just have to go with it), a liberal democracy.

A question: why are most of you Eastern-bloc? Is Eastern-bloc or neutral the requirement?

So finally, I have created the nation Kerbonisia (just have to go with it), a liberal democracy.

A question: why are most of you Eastern-bloc? Is Eastern-bloc or neutral the requirement?

Pure choice.

I believe we the Mainsail Initiative should join The Orchestra of Nations (http://www.bloc.name/forum/index.php/topic,1508.0.html). Lead by Jenkins and the African Union, the Orchestra abides by the following principles.

0. Always Peace in our time.

1. Alliances in this thing should be friendly to each other.

2. Alliances in this thing are liable for anything they break belonging to another alliance in this thing.

3. Alliances in this thing will help each other out if an outside alliance steps all up on.

4. Alliances in this thing got each others backs.

Joining the Orchestra will bring Mainsail influence, reputation, protection, and most importantly, peace. The terms of the application require one to three representatives of the alliance. I propose Arazavbenigo, myself (1941 Yankees), and one more nation (yet to be decided) jointly submit an application.
Velnova would agree with having the Mainsail Initiative join the Orchestra of Nations, however I would not want to be one of the Council reps.

I might think of basing on Asia, but it's hard. Still out of names, though. I thought of China, but then that didn't match, as I want a democratic nation. Oops.

EDIT: Why no Europe, or North America?

because those regions are all developed Bloc is a third world country game that takes place in the cold war.
so how is everyone's country doing
I believe it's doing well, but I have a almost ruined economy.
Well if you need any help just ask.The U.S.K is doing mighty fine lately.
Also doing fine. Someone did asked me to send 10k troops to their nation, and I can't confirm this until it is really true.
My nation is well. I have chemical weopons, a army of 30k elitely trained men, a powerful air force and plenty of money.
The U.S.K man power manage to raise back up so thats a good thing.
Doin' gooooood.
yay were doing well.How ou economical growth been lately ,or has there been any threats against us kerbals?
140 mil per month. Tech race against Imperium.

I'm worshiped as God! Unsinkable stability! Developed quality of life! Ghandi-like reputation!

And only 20-or so growth.
you guys are doing well the U.S.k had suffered a lot from the war that was caused by the rouge nation of Bonzo. Mainly my military is smaller ,and my growth was hit an is fully recovered.

Im at war with another nation called Scatman from the allaince of N.A.W

Update:The U.S.K is in grave need in troops ,and money to defend my selfs. Also I had to gas them to defend myself.

Edited August 24, 2013 by MGUARN
Roger that. I'm only able to send 10k, though, even though I have 20k.
thank you very much designer.also scatman attacked believeing i was an inactive country.So yah ....
I'm gonna be away for the next week so could keep an eye on my country that would be great.

i might try to play and if i do how would i join the allience

Edited August 25, 2013 by directorsnap
Losing membership on the alliance. We could use extra users.
Left this alliance to join another, sorry kerbs, But ill be yo royal member
we need to recruit
yup we need more countries to join this kerbal alliance.
